title: Delete Indefinitely Files
body:
Hello,

is there a way to somehow delete these Files manually?
author: Schnurp

comments.body:
Hello,

In the latest version, there is an admin panel that allows you to delete those files. Additionally, I’ve added a warning that non-password-protected files marked to "keep indefinitely" will only be deletable by an admin.

If you don’t want to update, you can manually delete the files from the file system and edit the database. Note that only deleting the files from the file system will result in them still appearing in the app, but an error will be thrown if someone tries to download them.
Very nice! Thank you very much!
